name: One Piece: Grand Battle!
description:
One Piece: Grand Battle! is a 2D versus fighting game similar to Super Smash Bros with 3D character models based on the One Piece anime and manga series. The game offers a total of sixteen playable character from the series up the Whiskey Peak Arc.

Each fighter has their own fighting techniques including special attacks and can run and jump on platforms in the various fighting arenas. Objects from (like barrels) the battlefield can be picked up and thrown at the opponent, these also contain power-ups. The sixteen playable characters are: Monkey D. Luffy, Roronoa Zoro, Nami, Usopp, Sanji, Kuro, Don Krieg, Arlong, Buggy, Alvida, Chaser, Tashigi, Nefeltari Vivi, Pandaman, Mihawk and Shanks. Some of the character have supporting characters. The two game modes offered are Grand Battle and Event Battle.
